sentences.sContent: She was deeply upset about the way her father treated her.
sentences.sCn: 父亲那样对她，她非常难过。

sentences.sContent: Don’t do anything that would upset him.

phrases.pCn: n. 肠胃不适，消化不良

words.tran: 令人心烦意乱的，令人苦恼的

remMethod.val: up(上)+set(放置)→心七上八下的→使…心烦意乱

trans.tranCn: 心烦意乱的；不安的；不适的
trans.tranOther: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

trans.tranCn: (过去式 upset, 过去分词 upset) 使不安；使心烦
trans.tranOther: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
